mapper.select:
SELECT t.id, loginName, t.`name`, `password`, sex, age, type, t.`status`, orgId, t.crTime, phone, s.`name` AS organizationName, o.id AS roleId, o.`name` AS roleName FROM user t LEFT JOIN user_role r ON t.id = r.userId LEFT JOIN role o ON r.roleId = o.id LEFT JOIN organization s ON s.id = t.orgId
t.id = #{id}
mapper.update: update user set password = #{pwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createdate = now() where id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
